ygData.subject: Re: 8th level pet
ygData.msgSnippet: As long as we re on this thread... what are some of the active factions in highkeep?  I want to know if i ve already helped/hindered my progress there Cogg -
ygData.messageBody:
As long as we're on this thread... what are some of the active factions in
highkeep? I want to know if i've already helped/hindered my progress there

Cogg - RZ

At 09:27 AM 5/10/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
>
>
>actually, from what i have seen and heard, the highkeep gaurds are friendly
>to dark elves. and, if you go to qeynos and kill jracol brestiage (a dark
>elf that hangs out in front of the city), your faction with all of highpass
>goes down (if you kill him 2 or 3 times, you can go to highkeep,t hey'll
>kill you on sight).
>
>Qorona of the Volition Guild, 17th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
>
>At 08:30 AM 5/10/99 -0500, you wrote:
>>From: "Miller, Keith A." <keithm@...>
>>
>>I strongly advise you do not try using dark elf illusions in high hold for 2
>>reasons....
>>
>>1. Your probably only L8 and wont see it for another 4 levels
>>2. The guards kill dark elves on sight I believe, and they are much worse
>>than the orcs.
>>
>>You were the victim of bad luck, i have made the trip with several L8
>>characters (and a L4 one once before the animations were added locally)and
>>have never had an orc see through my invisibility. I have had it wear off,
>>but was able to run to the guards and survive.
>>
>
>-------------------
>tim borrelli
>computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire
